name: packcc
install: if $(uname -s | grep -q MINGW); then { which clang 2>/dev/null && make -C build/mingw-clang && install -b build/mingw-clang/release/bin/packcc $PREFIX/bin; } || { which gcc 2>/dev/null && make -C build/mingw-gcc && install -b build/mingw-clang/release/bin/packcc $PREFIX/bin; }; else { which clang 2>/dev/null && make -C build/clang && install -b build/clang/release/bin/packcc $PREFIX/bin; } || { which gcc 2>/dev/null && make -C build/gcc && install -b build/clang/release/bin/packcc $PREFIX/bin; }; fi
